item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: MRK (Merck & Co., Inc.) Mega Merck & Co., Inc. has significant growth opportunities in oncology space with Keytruda approval, but risks exist in terms of insider selling and competition in the obesity market. PAGS (PagSeguro Digital Ltd.) Small PagSeguro Digital Ltd.
